name: 放課後マニア倶楽部―濃いの欲しいの―
summary: This game is similar to After School Love Club, it even has the same 12 girls and 3 guys. The main guy this time is one of the girl's brother. Instead of a lover, he wants a pet. He gets that by getting friendly with a girl then take advantage of her weakness for abnormal fun.
info:
• 平台: WIN98
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1997-06-13
  • ブランド: Libido
  • 原画: Joy Ride
